column4: i compiled 2.6.19 from kernel.org under dapper, when do a fresh install of edgy on the same machine later, can/should i use this same kernel?
I don't think there's a risk in trying it. Keep the stock edgy kernel handy in case it doesn't work, and be ready to recompile if need be.
I had that conflict with my son for a while. Now he's happy with Linux games :)
